page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content: {The area is mainly agricultural}with intensive arable farming & a few areas of woodland mainly around Tacolneston Hall.Tacolneston provides the main residential centre with scattered housing in Fundenhall & outlying farms Neither village has a centre.One B class main road traverses the area.New Road links with the B1135 to Wymondham other roads being lanes with few hedge rows.The Norwich to New Buckenham bus route runs along the main road. {Most residents work outside the area but there are retired people & a number of family-run farms.They also need to travel for most educational, medical & other social amenities. The TV & radio mast in New Road is a local landmark. {The rural quiet is regularly broken}by noise of low-flying aircraft from the many air bases in East Anglia.
